CustomField.formula:
OR( AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL( Store__r.MANAGEMENT_ZONE_LEVEL__c , '13')), TEXT( $User.MANAGEMENT_ZONE_LEVEL__c) == TEXT( Store__r.MANAGEMENT_ZONE_LEVEL__c) ),
AND( ISPICKVAL( Store__r.MANAGEMENT_ZONE_LEVEL__c , '13'), ISPICKVAL($User.Country__c,'KOREA'), Store_Country__c == 'KOREA' ),
AND( ISPICKVAL( Store__r.MANAGEMENT_ZONE_LEVEL__c , '13'), ISPICKVAL( $User.MANAGEMENT_ZONE_LEVEL__c , '13'), NOT(ISPICKVAL($User.Country__c,'KOREA')), Store_Country__c <> 'KOREA' ) )
CustomField.label: My Management Level Zone
